output.sentences: The family was excited to head to the beach.
They wanted to collect shells and investigate the marine creatures.
The sun shone down as the walked the rocky beach.
Kayaks lined the shore to be rented for excursions.
They shared a pair of binoculars while whale watching from the shore.
